resources.string: Welcome to the new era of payments. Make payments faster than ever before....
Some content X that can be explained here

* All your payment needs integrated into one single application


*Recharge your mobile with voice


* Blazing fast payments/booking through Quick Pay


* Recharge through voice


* Manage all you transaction easily and effortlessly


* Much more...

Ezee Pay is commited to customer safety, The payment platform we provide is safe and secure with enhanced security mechanism.


* SSL protected service layer ensures the data sent by customer is safe.


* Robust database mechanism to provide maximum safety for customer data.

Ezee Pay provides you the following online payment facilities directly from your mobile.


* Mobile/Datacard Recharge for all major service providers in India.


* DTH Recharge for all major platforms in India


* Book bus tickets


* Pay Landline Bills


* Pay Mobile Postpaid Bills


* Pay Electricity and Gas Bills(Only on supported Cities)


* Pay Insurance Premiums

We provide flexible payment option but not limited to credit cards,debit cards,net banking along with wallet which will be launched soon


* Credit Cards(Visa/Mastercard)


* Debit Cards(Visa/Master/Maestro cards)


* Net Banking(Supports all major banks)

Ezee Pay is a Mobile Payment platform enabling you to make payments for Mobile Recharges, DTH Recharges, Data Card Recharges,Mobile Post-paid, Land-line, Insurance Premiums, Electricity bills, Gas Bills, Booking Bus tickets

 Ezee Pay Mobile Appliaction is available for devices running Android platform 4.0 and above. Other platform supported will be added very soon

If a transaction fails on our side due to some technical reasons an immediate refund procedure will be triggered by our system, you can always contact us at support@ezeepayservice.com to know more about the status\n\n

Just say the phrase "recharge my mobile" with the amount you need to topup/recharge.


Voice based recharge can be done for the following functions

*Mobile/Datacard topup
*DTH

 Eg: Recharge my mobile with 50

Recharge my data card with 100

 Note: Your voice region should be set to India before using voice based recharge.

QuickPay data should be filled before using voice.
